st: Kaghaj Par Nahi Likhte Kuch Raaz Mohabbat Ke,
s:
Kaghaj Par Nahi Likhte Kuch Raaz Mohabbat Ke,
Pal Bhar Mein Bikhar Jaate Hain Alfaaz Mohabbat Ke,

Use Toot Kar Chaha Toh Hum Khud Hi Bikhar Gaye,
Aise Badal Jaate Hain Andaaj Mohabbat Ke,

Un ki Saheliyo Se Zara Kahna, Unhe Sath Hi Laaye,
Mujhe Phir Se Sajaane Hain Kuch Khwab Mohabbat Ke,

Apni To Saase Dost Usi Waqt Mein Thee Shaamil,
Kyun Baithe Huve Chor Gaye Kuch Haath Mohabbat Ke….

st: Woh Jamana Gujar Gaya Kab Ka,
s:
Woh Jamana Gujar Gaya Kab Ka,
Tha Jo Deevana Mar Gaya Kab Ka,

Dhundhta Tha Jo Ek Nayi Duniya,
Lotke Apne Ghar Gaya Kab Ka,

Woh Jo Laya Tha Humko Dariya Tak,
Par Akele Utar Gaya Kab Ka,

Uska Jo Haal Hai Wohi Jaane,
Apna Toh Jakham Bhar Gaya Kab Ka,

Khwab Dar Khwab Tha Jo Tana Bana,
Ab Kahan Hai Bikhar Gaya Kab Ka…

st: Raat bhigi toh thake sahar ko yaad aane lage
s:
Raat bhigi toh thake sahar ko yaad aane lage
Neend ke gaanv jo aabad hain palkon tale,

Doctor khwab ke nakhun the halahal mein bujhe
Hasba mamul badi jor se hum cheekh pade,

Jaise sachmuch ho badi neend mein us shokh ki yaad
Aisa seene mein bani leti hai aankhe meeche…

st: Parda e noor manke chhaye hain
s:
Parda e noor manke chhaye hain
Aansuon ki tarah machalte khwab,

Bikhre sishon par gir ke toot jaaye
Neend mein nange paanv chalte khwab,

Aisi sunsan dopahar mein kahan
Chand taaron ki tarah chalte khwab,

Bistre e dil par khoon ugalte khwab
Raat bhar karvatein badlate khwab…

st: Kabhi yun bhi aa meri aankh mein
s:
Kabhi yun bhi aa meri aankh mein
Ki meri najar ko khabar na ho,

Mujhe ek raat navaj de
Magar uske baad subah na ho,

Woh bada raham o karam hai
Mujhe yeh asar bhi daan karein,

Tujhe bhulane ki dua karun
Toh meri dua mein asar na ho,

Mere baajuon mein thaki thaki
Abhi khwab dekh rahi hai chandani,

Na uthe sitaron ki palki
Abhi aahton ka gujar na ho…

st: Raat bhigi toh thake sahar ko yaad aane lage
s:
Raat bhigi toh thake sahar ko yaad aane lage
Nind ke gaanv jo aajad hain palkon ke tale,

Doctor khwab ke naakhun the halahal mein bujhe
Hasb mamul badi jor se hum chikh pade,

Jaise sach much ho badi neend mein us shokh ki yaad
Aisa seene mein bani baithi hai aankhe meeche,

Maine samjhaya ke suraj bhi jhukega dar par
Varna taaron ki taraf muh kiye darwaje the,

Kal jise raat ki gadi pe hamin ne choda
Woh toh aankho mein fire hain magar hum hi na fire…

st: khwab ki vaadiyo se nikalta hua
s:
khwab ki vaadiyo se nikalta hua
chand sokar utha aankh malta hua

haath par dhoop ki pattiyan rakh gaya
koi phulon ki chadar badlata hua

shish mahal ke sisho se takra gaya
pathron se sabhlata utarta hua

sham tak hoga suraj hamari tarah
koi sukha hua ped jalta hua

ek aahat si najdeek aati huyi
lon mein sham ka phool khilta hua…

st: Jisne Loota Karwa Mera,
s:
Jisne Loota Karwa Mera,
Wahi Toh Tha Meharba Mera,

Khwabon Ki Adla Badli Mein,
Jal Gaya Th Aashiyaa Mera,

Husn Ka Jalwa Bina Dekhe,
Kho Gaya Tha Dilruba Mera,

Koul Se Hatne Ki Saajis Mein,
Usne Pakda Girebaa Mera,

Kaliyan Chahat Ki Masal Dali,
Fir Bhi Tha Woh Baghbaan Mera…

st: Woh Tujh Se Mil Ke,
s:
Woh Tujh Se Mil Ke,
Hashar Mein Puri Na Ho Kahin,
Thodi Si Hai,
Jo Kami Hamare Gunah Mein….

st: Unko Haarat Hai Ki Aasik Kyu Kar,
s:
Unko Haarat Hai Ki Aasik Kyu Kar,
Hum Pe Mar Mar Ke Jiye Jate Hain…

st: Kuchh Khabar Bhi Hai,
s:
Kuchh Khabar Bhi Hai,
Mohabbat Mein Daag,
Kya Tere Tour Huye Jaate Hain..

st: Woh Jaage Sahar Ko,
s:
Woh Jaage Sahar Ko,
Toh Ladte Hain Mujhse,
Ki The Koun Tum,
Khwab Mein Aane Wale…

st: Tere Deedar Ko Bhi Majma E Mashar Hi Jeba Ho,
s:
Tere Deedar Ko Bhi Majma E Mashar Hi Jeba Ho,
Ki Jaise Dekhne Wale Ho Vaisa Hi Tamasha Ho,

Jo Vahdat Mein Huyi,
Is Martaba Ki Ho Toh Jebaa Ho,

Tumhi Tum Ho Toh Behtar Ho,
Hami Hum Ho Toh Achha Ho,

Khumare May Se Yun,
Vakte Sahar Bigda Mijaj Apna,

Kisi Ne Raat Bhar,
Jaise Parishaa Khwab Dekha Ho…

st: Khawab Mein Bhi Bura,
s:
Khawab Mein Bhi Bura,
Usne Kaha Sabne Suna,

Jald Hoti Hai,
Buri Baat Ki Sohrat Kaisi,

Nigahe Yaar Ko,
Main Dil Mein Jagah Du Lekin,

Chor Ho Jab,
Koi Mehmaan Toh Ijjaat Kaisi,

Chhed Har Vakt Ki,
Achhhi Nahin Yeh Yaad Rahe,

Kabhi Kaisi Hai,
Kabhi Apni Tabiyat Kaisi…

st: Punya Ki Sabab Hai Mere Gunah Mein,
s:
Punya Ki Sabab Hai Mere Gunah Mein,
Dil Mandir Mein Aur Kadam Khankah Mein,

Khali Nahin Maje Se Koiparsa O Rind,
Lajjat Ise Punya Mein Usko Gunah Mein,

Woh Tujhse Milke Hasar Mein Puri Na Ho Kahin,
Thodi Si Jo Hai Kami Hamare Gunah Mein,

Jaalim Khuda Se Dar Ke Jahannum Ki Aag Hai,
Rudhan Hain Bekashon Ke Garibon Ki Aah Mein,

Dekha Jo Shab Ko Khwab Mein Us Chasme Mast Ko,
Kampan Hai Subahse Mere Aankho Ke Paanv Mein,

Jata Hai Daag Kaba Ko Butkhana Chhodkar,
Thokar Jarur Khayega Pathar Se Raah Mein…

st: Jor Ki Aadat Tere Dil Se Na Sitamgar Gayi,
s:
Jor Ki Aadat Tere Dil Se Na Sitamgar Gayi,
Umar Bhar Apni Wafa Sab Yu Bekar Gayi,

Aate Jaate Mere Sarhane Pe Mout Haar Gayi,
Aayi So Baar Sabbe Vada Toh So Baar Gayi,

Jisko Kahte Hain Asar Woh Na Mila Hai Na Mile,
Kya Gayi Aah Falak Ke Bhi Agar Paar Gayi,

Uska Muh Dekhte Hi Khwab Mein Hum Chonk Uthhe,
Apne Haath Aayi Huyi Doulte Bedar Gayyi,

Is Kadar Pass Raha Ishq Ki Rushvayi Ka,
Khak Bhi Meri Na Ud Kar Su E Bazar Gayi…

st: Kam Rukne Ka Nahin Hai Eh Dile Nadan Koi,
s:
Kam Rukne Ka Nahin Hai Eh Dile Nadan Koi,
Khud Ba Khud Rab Se Ho Jaayega Saama Koi,

Bechta Hu Jo Kharide Mere Armna Koi,
Muft Deta Hu Agar Maan Le Ahsaan Koi,

Ishq Jisko Na Ho Aisa Na Ho Insa Koi,
Aage Takdeer Hai Khush Ho Ki Paseman Koi,

Jab Se Iaq Se Touba Najar Aate Hain Yeh Khwab,
Khinchta Hai Koi Daaman Toh Garebaan Koi…

st: Ujaale Apni Yaado Ke Mere Paas Rahne Do,
s:
Ujaale Apni Yaado Ke Mere Paas Rahne Do,
Na Jaane Kis Gali Mein Zindagi Ki Sham Ho Jaaye,

Ab Ke Bichhde Toh Shayad Khawabo Mein Milen,
Jis Tarah Sukhe Huye Phool Kitabo Mein Milen,

Yaad Aata Unhe Yahan Aane Ka Wada Kab,
Raat Ko Paav Mein Mehandi Laga Chuke Woh Jab….

st: Hum Pyar Unhi Se Karte Hain,
s:
Hum Pyar Unhi Se Karte Hain,
Ab The Bhi Jatana Chhod Diya,

Hum Unse Kabho Ruthe Hi Nahin,
Aur Usne Bhi Manana Chhod Diya,

Marna Bhi Muskil Sa Hoga,
Jiske Bagair,

Us Sakhs Ne Khwabon Mein Bhi ,
Aana Chhod Diya…

st: Juda Hokar Bhi Woh Sataane Se,
s:
Juda Hokar Bhi Woh Sataane Se,
Baaj Nahin Aate,

Door Rahkar Bhi Who Dil Jalane,
Se Baaj Nahin Aate,

Hum Toh Bhulna Chahte Hain,
Unka Vaajud Bhi Khuda,

Magar Who Khawabo Mein Aane Se,
Baaj Nahin Aate…

st: Mar Jaayegi Sab Khwab,
s:
Mar Jaayegi Sab Khwab,
Toh Fir Kya Piyoge Aap,

Daaman Ho Taar Taar Toh,
Kya Seeyonge Aap,

Saaki Ne Maykase Mein Kaha,
Maykashon Se Pee,

Bujh Jaayegi Pyass,
Toh Kya Piyoge Aap…

st: Kudrat k niymo se inayat na karna,
s:
Kudrat k niymo se inayat na karna,
in hasin nazaro se kaymat na karna,
wo khud dega her chiz tumko bas,
waqt se pahle pane ki khawhish na karna…

st: Ab Khawab Nahi Aate Mujhe
s:
Ab Khawab Nahi Aate Mujhe
Khawab Toot Jate Hai,

Ab Rishte Nahi Bhate Mujhe
Rishte Loot Jate Hai,

Ab Rona Nahi Aata Mujhe
Par Aansu Choot Jate Hai,

Ab Muskurana Nahi Aata Mujhe
Khushi Ke Pal Nahi Aate Hai,

Ab Wo Yaad Nahi Aate Mujhe
Unhe Hum Bhool Nahi Pate Hai…

st: Khwabo mein aakar yun na sataya karo
s:
Khwabo mein aakar yun na sataya karo
Karta hun pyar to sahi waqt aaya karo
Raat ko bhi bhala aane ka waqt hai
Din mein mil raat ko pass reh jaya karo
Phir dekhein husan-e-shabab ka dum
Pass aao to jaane door se na itraya karo…

st: Ae neend zara dhire aa,
s:
Ae neend zara dhire aa,
Lagta hai unke khwabo me ane ka waqt ho gaya hai,
Is pal ke intezar me, suraj dhal gaya hai,
Yahi waqt hai mulakat ka…
Kya btaye yaaro kitna haseen khwab aaya hai,
Shayad ruthe the wo humse, pehli bar kisiko manane me maza aya hai,
Baate to hoti hain magar khwabo me apka iskadar aana kuch naya hai,
Chahe faaslo ne kitni bhi zurrat ki ho darmiyo ki,
Aap kaise bhuloge ki hum apka saya hain…

st: Ek pal ehsas ban ke aate ho
s:
Ek pal ehsas ban ke aate ho
Or dusre pal khwab ban k udd jaate ho
Yeh maloom hai ki tanhai se dar lagta hai hamay
Phir bhi bar bar tanha chhor jaate ho…

st: Raat Soyi To Par Nind Meri Aankho Se Door Hi Rahi,
s:
Raat Soyi To Par Nind Meri Aankho Se Door Hi Rahi,
Palke Band Ki To Thi Par Unme Tumhara Hi Khawab Raha,
Na Chahte Huye Bhi Chhaya Raha Muj Par, Tumhari Baato Ka Ek Nasha,
Or Dhadkanome Tumhara Hi Nam Gunjata Raha,
Har Sans Ke Sath, Jitna Bhi Chaha Tumhari Socho Se Bhagna,
Utna Hi Tum Mere Karib Aate Gaye,
Tumhari Baato Me Khoti Huyi Ye Diwani,
Chupchap Se Piglati Rahi Shama Ke Mom Ki Tarah….

st: Kuchh To Jarur Huaa Hai Wo Aise Badal Nhi Sakte,
s:
Kuchh To Jarur Huaa Hai Wo Aise Badal Nhi Sakte,
Wada Karke Wade Se Mukar Nhi Sakte,
Itane Nazuk To ’Kumar’ Tere Khwab Nhi Hai,
Jo Sheeshe Ki Tarah Tutkar Bikhar Nhi Sakte….

st: Hamare Ashk Mein Apka Khwab Chhupa Hai
s:
Hamare Ashk Mein Apka Khwab Chhupa Hai
Hamari Khushi Mein Apka Ehsas Chupa Hai
Tum Hamari Dastan Mein Raho Ya Na Raho
Lekin Is Dil Mein Hamesha Aapke Liye Pyar Chupa Hai…

st: Bichadte Hue Yaad De Jayenge
s:
Bichadte Hue Yaad De Jayenge
Khud Sone Se Pehle Ek Khwab De Jayenge
Aapko Gila Hai Hum Baat Nahi Karte
Sanso Ke Rukne Se Pehle Jawab De Jayenge…

st: Dil Ke Sagar Mein Lehar Uthaya Na Karo
s:
Dil Ke Sagar Mein Lehar Uthaya Na Karo
Khwab Ban Kar Neend Ko Churaya Na Karo
Bahut Zakhm Khaye Hain Mere Sanam
Tum Khwabon Mein Aakar Jaya Na Karo…

st: Yuhi Sapno Se Dil Lagaya Karo
s:
Yuhi Sapno Se Dil Lagaya Karo
Kisi Ke Khwabo Mein Aaya Jaya Karo
Jab Bhi Dil Kare Ki Koi Tumhe Bhi Subah Jagaye
Bas Hume Yaad Karke So Jaya Karo…

st: Koi Milta Hi Nahi Humse Humara Bankar
s:
Koi Milta Hi Nahi Humse Humara Bankar
Wo Mile Bhi To Ek Kinara Bankar
Har Khwab Toot Ke Bikhra Kanch Ki Tarah
Bas Ek Intezar Hai Sath, Sahara Bankar…

st: Mere Mehboob Ko Jis Din, Janab Dekhoge
s:
Mere Mehboob Ko Jis Din, Janab Dekhoge
Hosh Ud Jayenge Jab Benaqab Dekhoge
Noor Par Ek Aftab Dekhoge
Raat To Raat Rahi Din Mein Bhi Khwab Dekhoge

st: Hothon Pe Mohabbat Ke Fasaane Nahi Aate
s:
Hothon Pe Mohabbat Ke Fasaane Nahi Aate
Sahil Pe Samander Ke Khazane Nahi Aate

Palkein Bhi Chamak Uth-ti Hain Sote Huye Humari
Aankho Ko Abhi Khwab Chupane Nahi Aate

Dil Ujadi Huyi Ek Saraay Ki Tarah Hai
Ab Log Yahan Raat Bitane Nahi Aate

Udne Do Parindo Ko Abhi Shokh Hawa Mein
Fil Laut Ke Bachpan Ke Zamane Nahi Aate

Kya Soch Ke Aaye Ho Mohabbat Ki Gali Mein
Jab Naaz Haseeno Ke Uthane Nahi Aate

Apne Bhi Gairon Ki Ada Seekh Gaye Hain
Aate Hain Magar Dil Ko Dukhane Nahi Aate

st: Bistar-E-Dil Pe Khoon Uglate Khwab
s:
Bistar-E-Dil Pe Khoon Uglate Khwab
Raat Bhar Karvatein Badlate Khwab

Waqt Ki Dhoop Regzar-E-Hyat*
Barf Ki Tarah Se Pighlate Khwab

Parda-E-Noor Banke Chhaye Hain
Aasuon Ki Tarah Machlate Khwab

Bikhare Sheesho Pe Gir Ke Toot Gaye
Neend Mein Nange Paanv Chalte Khwab

Aisi Sunsan Dhopher Mein Kahan
Chand Taaron Ki Tarah Chalte Khwab

Ye Hawa-E-Haqiqat-E-Farda**
Ye Chiragon Ki Tarah Jalte Khwab

st: Benaam Sa Ye Dard Thahr Kyon Nahi Jata
s:
Benaam Sa Ye Dard Thahr Kyon Nahi Jata
Jo Beet Gaya Hai Voh Guzar Kyon Nahi Jata

Sab Kuch To Hai Kya Dhoondhti Rehti Hain Nigahein
Kya Baat Hai Main Waqt Pe Ghar Kyon Nahi Jata

Vo Ek Hi Chehra To Nahi Saare Jahan Mein
Jo Door Hai Voh Dil Se Utar Kyon Nahi Jata

Main Apni Hi Uljhi Huyi Raahon Ka Tamasha
Jaate Hain Jidhar Sab, Main Udhar Kyon Nahi Jata

Voh Khwab Jo Barson Se Na Chehra, Na Badan Hai
Voh Khwab Hawaon Mein Bikhar Kyon Nahi Jata
